qlabel: 1 ROAD_aASR_RADIO_4_1 - In the last working week, did you work with any asbestos-containing materials?
1A1 ROAD_aASR_RADIO_4_1A1 - What type of work did you do involving asbestos-containing material?

categories.catLabel: aASR_1A1A Repair or maintenance tasks (not involving removal of asbestos-containing materials)

qlabel: 1A1A1 ROAD_aASR_CHECK_4_1A1A1 - Which materials did you work with?

categories.catLabel: aASR_1A1A1C Gaskets that could contain asbestos

qlabel: 1A1A1G1 ROAD_aASR_RADIO_4_1A1A1G1 - Please specify
1A1A2 ROAD_aASR_RADIO_4_1A1A2 - Did you cut, grind or break up the asbestos-containing material or were you exposed to it by accident?
1A1A3 ROAD_aASR_RADIO_4_1A1A3 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection?
1A1A3A1 ROAD_aASR_CHECK_4_1A1A3A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?

categories.catLabel: aASR_1A1A3A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge
aASR_1A1A3A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus)
aASR_1A1A3A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP)

qlabel: 1A1A4 ROAD_aASR_CHECK_4_1A1A4 - How did you clean up the dust in the last working week?

categories.catLabel: aASR_1A1A4B Using vacuum cleaner fitted with a HEPA filter
aASR_1A1A4D Using a brush or sweeping the area with a broom
aASR_1A1A4E Mopping the area with water
aASR_1A1A4G The working area was not cleaned of dust

qlabel: 1A1B1 ROAD_aASR_CHECK_4_1A1B1 - Which of the following asbestos-containing materials did you remove?

categories.catLabel: aASR_1A1B1A Fibro (fibrous cement) sheet (external cladding, roofing, pipes, internal wet-area lining sheets)
aASR_1A1B1B Asbestos cavity insulation (from wall or ceiling cavities in buildings)
aASR_1A1B1C Fire rated board or millboard
aASR_1A1B1E Any asbestos-containing material from onboard a ship, train or other mobile plant
aASR_1A1B1F Lagging/insulation from boilers/ovens/furnaces or similar fixed plant
aASR_1A1B1H Road paving or asphalt containing asbestos

qlabel: 1A1B2 ROAD_aASR_CHECK_4_1A1B2 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following methods to remove the asbestos containing materials?

categories.catLabel: aASR_1A1B2B Saturation and water injection method
aASR_1A1B2D Hammering or using power tools (e.g. disc cutters, saws, etc)

1A1B6 ROAD_aASR_RADIO_4_1A1B6 - Did you shower before or after removing PPE?
1A1B7 ROAD_aASR_RADIO_4_1A1B7 - In the last working week, what was the last item of PPE you removed following work?
1A1B8 ROAD_aASR_RADIO_4_1A1B8 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protective equipment when removing the asbestos containing materials?
1A1B8A1 ROAD_aASR_CHECK_4_1A1B8A1 - What  type of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use when removing the asbestos-containing materials in the last working week?
